programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: A police officer travels to Vietnam to extradite a suspect and discovers a murderer who has been targeting tourists for years.

programme.title: Born to Fight
programme.desc: When a Vietnam veteran is hired by a TV reporter to return to where he was tortured as a P.O.W., the fuse is lit for vengeance.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: A police officer travels to Vietnam to extradite a suspect and discovers a murderer who has been targeting tourists for years.

programme.title: Born to Fight
programme.desc: When a Vietnam veteran is hired by a TV reporter to return to where he was tortured as a P.O.W., the fuse is lit for vengeance.

programme.title: Luc Van Tien: Kung Fu Warrior
programme.desc: An ancient warrior time travels to modern-day Vietnam to battle a criminal organization and find his true love.

programme.title: Blood of the Dragon
programme.desc: White Dragon must get a list with the names of rebel supporters to Prince Ma Tung, the leader of the rebellion. Trying to stop him in his mission is the evil prime minister, who naturally wants the list so he can crush his opposition.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: An ex-member of the Ch'ing emperor's flying-blade force develops a similar weapon to repel attacks on innocent commoners.

programme.title: Master of the Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: A blind man disguises himself as a priest and vows to kill a one-armed boxer with a weapon that can decapitate.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: An electronics mogul (John Ritter) coerces a former commander (Olivier Gruner) into helping him find the terrorist who killed his wife.

programme.title: Yakuza Graveyard
programme.desc: An unorthodox detective (Tetsuya Watari) leads a team to thwart violent gangsters.

programme.title: Kill-Fist
programme.desc: A man on the verge of losing custody of his daughter signs up for an underground fighting game to get some money.

programme.title: The Policeman's Lineage
programme.desc: A by-the-book police officer is assigned to secretly investigate a team leader who believes that the rules shouldn't stop an investigation. As the officer investigates further, his own attitudes begin to mirror the team leader's.

programme.title: The Fifth Cord
programme.desc: Police seem powerless to halt a mass murderer's campaign of madness and mayhem.
